title: Remain On Hold - Super 8 Fashion Film
creator: United Studio Collective
description:
Remain On Hold - Super 8 Fashion Film

Fashion film inspired by 60s/70s style, clothing, and architecture. Two friends have a conversation around the city discussing the potential of getting back together with their exes. All Shot on Super 8

Produced by: United Studio Collective
Starring: Jerry Tsagamilis, Becker Dunn & Jessica Maxwell
Directed by: Evan Rene
Assistant Director: Jessica Maxwell
Written by: Arman Nasseri & Evan Rene
Music by: Aidean Nasseri
Camera: Arman Nasseri & Andy Cruz
Costume: Raeanne Watkins
BTS Photographers: Katie Chew, Stefanos Stoikos, Dimitri Pollalis
Film Development House: Pro8mm

title: The Seasons of Fall
creator: United Studio Collective
description:
A piece of trash on the corner of the street.
Oozing black goo floating in the Pacific.
A recovery effort to save the animals.
The continual hatred growing towards your fellow man.

The looming extinction of Mankind.
We want.
We need.
We take.
Without care, with no remorse.

Director: @ion.ana.1og & @_evanrene_
Produced By: @unitedstudiocollective
Produced By: @_evanrene_
DP: @_evanrene_
Talent: @tommyiceee
First AC: @cparkphotogenix
Gaffer: @kane_e_thompson

title: Through The Night
creator: United Studio Collective
description: Through The Night: A short film based on the feelings and emotions we all experience through life. Shown through the lens of a night drive through Los Angeles. Shot on, Blackmagic URSA Mini Pro.

title: Blackmagic URSA Mini Pro Fashion Film: The Rae Sisters
creator: United Studio Collective
description: Using the Blackmagic URSA Mini Pro, we asked some friends to help us with a short fashion film/camera test. Featuring: The Rae Sisters

title: Delikate Rayne Desert Fashion Shoot
creator: United Studio Collective
description: A mystical journey through the desert, looking through the eyes of LA-based vegan fashion brand, Delikate Rayne.
